#Load Libraries
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```

#ChlA Data
```{r}
ChlA_Data_Porter <- 
  readr::read_csv(file = "ChlA-Data.csv",
                  col_types = "ccccdcddddddddc") %>%
  filter(Site == "Porter_Above") %>%
  group_by(Date_collected, Site_1)
ChlA_Data_Porter
```

#AFD Data
```{r}
AFD_Data_Porter <-
  readr::read_csv(file = "AFD-Data.csv",
                  col_types = "ccccdcddddddddc") %>%
  filter(Site == "Porter_Above") %>%
  group_by(Date_collected, Site_1) %>%
  select(Date_collected, Site_1, Cobble_SID, Pool_or_Riffle, Dry_Weight_g, AFD_Weight_g, Difference)
AFD_Data_Porter
```
